data.subject: Meet Us At The Southern Sign
data.lyric:
Heralds of a deadly time yet to come
 Forged over the greatness of baneful tunes
 
 Meet us at the S

data.subject: Fivefold Thought
data.lyric:

 Wicked power and glory bright

data.subject: The Blazing Darkness (Of Luciferian Skies)
data.lyric:
The blazing darkness of Luciferian skies
 Vpon which no man can safely set his eyes
 Was meant to be

data.subject: Nox Illuminatio Mea
data.lyric:
In early visions of the night
 And waking dreams of lust and might
 A prophet of the great Lilith
 M

data.subject: In Every Grief-Stricken Blues
data.lyric:
I believe these pale bones are mine
 And all this dust over that grave
 Today should float and twist

data.subject: There Is But One Light
data.lyric:
O nothing reveals the Dark of willful eyes
 As in those temples where the Light
 Springs forth from

data.subject: The Forbidden Words
data.lyric:
In my mind echoes the ireful chant
 See me stand with fire in my hands
 
 Master, Hear now my wicked

data.subject: Once In A Blood Red Moon
data.lyric:
Free from enduring slumber, From barren flesh ascend
 Prone before eternity, Seek the unknowable
 Ex

data.subject: Stigma Diaboli
data.lyric:
Psalm savior has faded but the evil abide forever
 The world is exhausted so come forth and rise Fat

data.subject: Darkened Shroud
data.lyric:
Specters fall across the shadow flames of void
 Fly from spheres they shan't dwell in forever
 Rushi
